mapper.select: SELECT * from admin where username=#{username} and password=#{password}
select distinct m.* from admin u inner join role_md rm on rm.rid=u.r_id INNER JOIN module m on m.id =rm.mid where u.id=#{id} and m.slevel=1
select distinct m.* from admin u inner join role_md rm on rm.rid=u.r_id INNER JOIN module m on m.id =rm.mid where u.id=#{user.id} and m.slevel=2 and m.pid=#{parent.id}
